channel.title: SO, What exactly is a client?
channel.description: So im kind of confused as im tryign to make a server still... So a source is basically the whole game programed while a client is what runs the game right? Will any client run any source? Do you make your client or it comes with source? I need help and can somone please give me a begginer client and source

item.title: SO, What exactly is a client?
item.dc:creator: @Gold_Light Gold Light
item.description:
@Gold_Light wrote:

A client is an application or system that accesses a remote service on another computer system, known as a server, by way of a network. The term was first applied to devices that were not capable of running their own stand-alone programs, but could interact with remote computers via a network. These dumb terminals were clients of the time-sharing mainframe computer.

Basically it runs the game, Most Clients should work with any Source but you can be sure there will be Nulls

People do make clients and Sources but lots of people Leech.

Read full topic
item.source: SO, What exactly is a client?
